summary: After purchasing Louisiana from France, the USA sends surveyors Lewis and Clark, assisted by a Shoshone guide, to chart the new territory.
cast: Fred MacMurray|Charlton Heston|Donna Reed|Barbara Hale|William Demarest|Alan Reed|Eduardo Noriega|Larry Pennell|Argentina Brunetti|Julia Montoya|Ralph Moody|Herbert Heyes|Lester Matthews|Helen Wallace|Walter Reed|Fran Bennett|Joe Canutt|Frank Fowler|Bob Herron|Bill Hickman|Robert Hinkle|Leroy Johnson|Margarita Martín|Tom Monroe|Voltaire Perkins|William Phipps|Vernon Rich|Herman Scharff|Bill Walker|Al Wyatt Sr.
keywords: lewis and clark|missouri river|1800s|explorer|based on novel
title: Horizontes azules
